form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Screeneded by NARA, 7/26/2023, Catholic Social Services, Inc.

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/26/2023 JL r CATHOLIC SOCIAL SERVICES, INC. June 16, 1994 BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRESIDENT Archbishop John F. Donoghue, D.D. UNHCR CHAIRMAN P.O. Box 1076 Martha Lee Doyle Addis Ababa, Ethiopia VICE CHAIRMAN Walter Denero SECRETARY Stuart A. Cashin, Jr., C.P.A. Dear Sir/Madam: TREASURER James F. Harrington, C.P.A. I am writing you in regard to a Somali refugee family who are residing in Ethiopia. Please note the copy of the Affidavit of Relationship I have included. The Nathan Andereck Judge Charles Auslander family knows they should go to Kenya to be processed as Roland E. Blanding, Jr. refugees but they fear that the trip would be too Paula Bonds, Esq. dangerous and risky for the father of the family, Ahmed Rev. Stephen Churchwell Hassan Omar, who is an old man in deteriorating health. Henry deGive, Esq. Lee Dehihns, Esq. The family in Ethiopia approached the U.S. Embassy who Becky Fratesi said they could do nothing until they heard from you. Jerry Lett To the best of my understanding your agency, UNHCR, Reverend Hugh Marren said they could not proceed until they had a request Sally Ann McNulty from our agency USCC. Marta Miller John Murphy If at all possible could you make an exception and help Sr. Josephine Patti, G.N.S.H. facilitate the processing of this case with the U.S. William M. Rich, Esq. Embassy. The family members here in the U.S. are very Janet Rechtman anxious about their situation and concerned over Lorne Twiner fighting in Ethiopia between government forces and Danny Vargas Ethiopians of Somalian descent. EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR Pam Buckmaster Please advise me in how I should proceed in this matter. My telephone # is 404/885-7243 and my fax # is 888-7816. Sincerely, CATHOLIC SOCIAL SERVICES, INC. Bot Koread Bob Kamack Migration and Refugee Services USCC 680 West Peachtree St., NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30308-1984, 404/881-6571, FAX 404/888-7816 United
